name: Old Fashioned
description: The Old Fashioned. The quintessential Bourbon drink and one of the oldest cocktails in the world.
steps: Add demerara syrup, Angostura bitters, and bourbon to a rocks glass.
Add ice. A large rock works best. Stir until well chilled.
Spritz an orange peel into the glass and drop the peel in.
footnote: As a bonus, drop in a Maraschino cherry on a cocktail stick.
